alert.note: Alert for Dane; Jefferson (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 19 at 1:50PM CDT until April 19 at 2:15PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Dane County in south central Wisconsin... Western Jefferson County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 215 PM CDT. * At 150 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Cambridge, or near Stoughton, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Fort Atkinson, Jefferson, Lake Mills, Deerfield, Cambridge, Lake Ripley, Lake Koshkonong, Albion, Milford, Utica, Rockdale, and Busseyville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
